about.summary: A collection of functions for computations and visualizations of microbial pan-genomes.

name: r-micropan
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '2.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-micropan
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/micropan_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/micropan/micropan_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 87ee471fef770d7e049bbfc1b8b8c6b86498b001e220162a147601236b98c542

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{posix}}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr
    - r-igraph
    - r-microseq
    - r-rlang
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr
    - r-igraph
    - r-microseq
    - r-rlang
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('micropan')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('micropan')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=micropan
  license: GPL-2
  summary: A collection of functions for computations and visualizations of microbial pan-genomes.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: micropan
# Type: Package
# Title: Microbial Pan-Genome Analysis
# Version: 2.0
# Date: 2020-01-05
# Author: Lars Snipen and Kristian Hovde Liland
# Maintainer: Lars Snipen <lars.snipen@nmbu.no>
# Description: A collection of functions for computations and visualizations of microbial pan-genomes.
# License: GPL-2
# Depends: R (>= 3.5.0), microseq, dplyr, stringr
# Imports: igraph, tibble, rlang
# LazyData: FALSE
# ZipData: TRUE
# RoxygenNote: 7.0.2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2020-01-19 10:18:25 UTC; larssn
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2020-01-19 18:30:06 UTC
